resources.string:
Select button operation

Click on a button to cycle through a set of possible values. The buttons are:

Sampling Rate
Selects the sampling rate, in samples/second

Sample Resolution
Selects the number of frequency bins. More bins provides better resolution, but takes more compute power.

Magnitude Scale
Selects minimum value displayed (in db)

run/stop
stop freezes the display, show the peak detection result.
run resumes analyzing samples.

on/test
test mode displays an algoritmically generated waveform.
on analyzes the microphone input signal.

Other Features

Peak Detection

Set Test Frequencies
(removed from this version)

by S A Uhler
